response_text: The official pricing page for Typeform is: [https://www.typeform.com/pricing/](https://www.typeform.com/pricing/)【3:0†source】.

Be on-brand

[Start with a template](https://www.typeform.com/help/a/use-a-template-360029294412/)

Save time and effort with templates you can customize to fit what your brand needs.

[Add your brand logo](https://www.typeform.com/help/a/add-your-brand-logo-to-a-typeform-4408191306388/)

Display your logo on every screen of your form.

[Customize your form’s metadata](https://www.typeform.com/help/a/customize-your-link-settings-and-meta-information-360029291852/#h_01G6SPGZG66VW34951GJY54FR3)

Customize your form link previews on social media and messaging apps.

[Apply premium themes](https://www.typeform.com/help/a/premium-themes-4404783038100/)

Choose a theme from our designer-curated gallery and customize your form to match your brand’s personality.

[Remove Typeform branding from your forms](https://www.typeform.com/help/a/remove-typeform-branding-360029262372/)

Remove the Typeform footer from your forms.

[Create a brand kit](https://www.typeform.com/help/a/apply-brand-assets-and-visuals-to-your-forms-with-brand-kits-6903894666004/)

Create a library of logos, images, and media to use consistently across your organization.

[Create custom links for different forms](https://www.typeform.com/help/a/how-to-customize-your-form-url-360029251372/#h_ef7e90aa-6f72-4320-ba3b-bdba177e0119)

Give a custom form ID to your form’s URL.

[Create a custom subdomain for your account](https://www.typeform.com/help/a/how-to-customize-your-form-url-360029251372/#h_f5958204-fc49-4924-b7ed-406153e887a6)

Choose a unique subdomain to use across all your forms.

[Add custom fonts](https://www.typeform.com/help/a/add-custom-fonts-to-your-forms-28794610333332/)

Upload your own fonts so every form you create aligns with your brand identity.

[Connect a custom domain to your account](https://www.typeform.com/help/a/custom-domains-for-enterprise-plus-accounts-4404606584852/)

Set up a custom domain to use across all your forms.

Customize your forms

[Multiple endings per form](https://www.typeform.com/help/a/show-different-endings-based-on-score-360051562852/)

Show different endings to different respondents based on your form logic. Trigger order summaries, thank you notes, or even feedback requests.

[Add logic to your forms](https://www.typeform.com/help/a/what-is-logic-360029116392/)

Add logic to your forms to connect, skip, and rearrange questions as needed.

[Recall information](https://www.typeform.com/help/a/use-recall-information-to-reference-typeform-answers-variables-and-more-360052320011/)

Pull data from previous questions and bring back information to show respondents. Use recall information with variables, hidden fields, scores, and prices.

[Add scores and calculations to your forms](https://www.typeform.com/help/a/add-scores-and-calculations-to-your-forms-360054424131/)

Solve scores, prices, quiz results with questions designed to qualify leads, order forms, and more.

[Create a quiz](https://www.typeform.com/help/a/create-a-quiz-360054384092/)

Use logic to calculate quiz scores and create outcome quizzes.

[Add custom variables](https://www.typeform.com/help/a/how-to-add-and-change-variables-360052365212/)

Create custom numeric or text values that your form can keep track of.

[Personalize with hidden fields](https://www.typeform.com/help/s/hidden-fields-360006025431/)

Use data you already have, track information about your respondents, and make your forms more personal.

[Create forms in multiple languages](https://www.typeform.com/help/a/create-multi-language-forms-23541138531732/)

Enable form translation to allow respondents to view and respond to any form in their own language.

Exclusive to growth plans

[Add video questions](https://www.typeform.com/help/a/add-video-questions-to-your-form-25762929948692/)

Record, edit, and embed personalized videos into your forms.

Exclusive to growth plans

[Prevent spam submissions with reCAPTCHA](https://www.typeform.com/help/a/secure-your-forms-with-google-re-captcha-protection-25059939542804/)

Boost your form’s security and prevent bot attacks to make sure the data you collect is authentic and reliable.

Exclusive to growth plans

[Prevent duplicate responses](https://www.typeform.com/help/a/prevent-duplicate-responses-27917825492244/)

Ensure the accuracy of your data by preventing multiple responses from the same respondent.

Share and embed

[Embed forms](https://www.typeform.com/help/a/embed-your-form-360029249212/)

Embed your form on your website, in an email, and more.

[Set up custom launch options for embedded forms](https://www.typeform.com/help/a/advanced-embed-options-360049535352/)

Launch your embedded form after a delay, scroll, page exit and engage your audience at the right time.

[Set forms to close on submit](https://www.typeform.com/help/a/advanced-embed-options-360049535352/)

Program your form to close after a response is submitted.

"Quartz managed to convince 940 of the world’s business leaders to tell us how they consume news and respond to advertising thanks to Typeform"

![Image 43](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66ffe2174aa8e8d5661c2708/6735841554bef1ab861d193d_testimonial-avatar-mia_mabanta.avif)

Mia Mabanta

Director of Brand Development at Quartz

### What's the difference between the Core and Typeform for Growth plans?

Typeform for Growth features a new collection of powerful marketing intelligence and video engagement capabilities designed to help businesses across the globe scale personalized marketing and drive revenue growth. Typeform for Growth plans include all features on the Core plans.

### How do I sign up?

Pick a plan above to get started. We’ll ask you for a few basic details. Then you’re in.

### What features can I use for free?

You get these features on our free plan:

‍

*   Unlimited typeforms
*   10 questions per typeform
*   10 responses per month
*   Logic jumps
*   Multiple ending screens
*   Hidden fields
*   Calculator
*   Templates
*   Embed your typeform in a web page
*   Download your data
*   Zapier, Automate.io, Slack, Mailchimp, HubSpot, and other integrations

‍

You can also try features from our paid plans. In that case, your typeform will go into trial mode. You won’t be able to share it and collect responses unless you upgrade to a paid plan (or remove the trial features).

### Do I need to know how to code?

_true == false_

‍

Joke for the coders there. The answer is no.

‍

It’s easy to make a typeform. Pick a question type, write your question, then add images, design themes, fonts, backgrounds, and more.

‍

You can even start with one of our [templates](https://www.typeform.com/templates) and just edit the text.

### Do typeforms work on all devices?

Typeforms look and feel great on mobile, tablet, and desktop.

### Do I get a discount if I pay yearly instead of monthly?

You do, indeed. **16%** to be precise.

### Is there a limit to the number of responses I can collect?

Each plan comes with a number of responses/month included, and has its own maximum monthly response limit. Up to this limit, you can upgrade your responses/month as much as you want.

‍

If you need more than 50,000 responses/month, [contact our sales team](https://tfsales.typeform.com/to/lhcebvr6?source=website&source2=public%20pricing%20page) to create a custom plan tailored to your business.

### How is my data safe?

The security and integrity of your data are critically important for us, and we’ve built our services around this idea. Once your information enters Typeform’s systems (located in AWS), it’s secured with multiple levels of encryption and access controls, for example:

‍

*   Your data in-transit is encrypted using secure TLS cryptographic protocols (TLS 1.2).
*   Your data at rest is encrypted using Advanced Encryption Standard (AES) with a 256-bit key.
*   Redundant backups of critical data are also in place to ensure business continuity in case of disaster.

‍

For more detail on the security measures, please visit [Security at Typeform](https://help.typeform.com/hc/en-us/articles/360029259552-Security-at-Typeform).

### What can I do with my data once it's collected?

You can see all your responses in our Results area and create reports to share with your team, Twitter (X) follower, or local bus driver.

‍

Typeform [connects with hundreds of apps](https://www.typeform.com/connect) so you can go on and do much more with your data.

‍

And for the technically gifted, you can set up webhooks and use our APIs to create solutions that adapt to your business. Read more in our [Developer Portal](https://www.typeform.com/connect-category/it-engineering).

How you ask is everything
-------------------------

### What's the difference between the Core and Typeform for Growth plans?

Typeform for Growth features a new collection of powerful marketing intelligence and video engagement capabilities designed to help businesses across the globe scale personalized marketing and drive revenue growth. Typeform for Growth plans include all features on the Core plans.

### How do I sign up?

Pick a plan above to get started. We’ll ask you for a few basic details. Then you’re in.

### What features can I use for free?

You get these features on our free plan:

‍

*   Unlimited typeforms
*   10 questions per typeform
*   10 responses per month
*   Logic jumps
*   Multiple ending screens
*   Hidden fields
*   Calculator
*   Templates
*   Embed your typeform in a web page
*   Download your data
*   Zapier, Automate.io, Slack, Mailchimp, HubSpot, and other integrations

‍

You can also try features from our paid plans. In that case, your typeform will go into trial mode. You won’t be able to share it and collect responses unless you upgrade to a paid plan (or remove the trial features).

### Do I need to know how to code?

_true == false_

‍

Joke for the coders there. The answer is no.

‍

It’s easy to make a typeform. Pick a question type, write your question, then add images, design themes, fonts, backgrounds, and more.

‍

You can even start with one of our [templates](https://www.typeform.com/templates) and just edit the text.

### Do typeforms work on all devices?

Typeforms look and feel great on mobile, tablet, and desktop.

### Do I get a discount if I pay yearly instead of monthly?

You do, indeed. **16%** to be precise.

### Is there a limit to the number of responses I can collect?

Each plan comes with a number of responses/month included, and has its own maximum monthly response limit. Up to this limit, you can upgrade your responses/month as much as you want.

‍

If you need more than 50,000 responses/month, [contact our sales team](https://tfsales.typeform.com/to/lhcebvr6?source=website&source2=public%20pricing%20page) to create a custom plan tailored to your business.

### How is my data safe?

The security and integrity of your data are critically important for us, and we’ve built our services around this idea. Once your information enters Typeform’s systems (located in AWS), it’s secured with multiple levels of encryption and access controls, for example:

‍

*   Your data in-transit is encrypted using secure TLS cryptographic protocols (TLS 1.2).
*   Your data at rest is encrypted using Advanced Encryption Standard (AES) with a 256-bit key.
*   Redundant backups of critical data are also in place to ensure business continuity in case of disaster.

‍

For more detail on the security measures, please visit [Security at Typeform](https://help.typeform.com/hc/en-us/articles/360029259552-Security-at-Typeform).

### What can I do with my data once it's collected?

You can see all your responses in our Results area and create reports to share with your team, Twitter (X) follower, or local bus driver.

‍

Typeform [connects with hundreds of apps](https://www.typeform.com/connect) so you can go on and do much more with your data.

‍

And for the technically gifted, you can set up webhooks and use our APIs to create solutions that adapt to your business. Read more in our [Developer Portal](https://www.typeform.com/connect-category/it-engineering).

How you ask is everything
-------------------------
